radiographic_examinations.findings: Atelectasis in the left lower lobe, hepatic steatosis, colonic diverticulosis with fat stranding and colonic wall thickening adjacent to sigmoid diverticula, extra luminal gas adjacent to inflamed diverticulum compatible with micro perforation, scattered mesenteric lymph nodes up to 8 mm, mild atherosclerotic disease, normal appearance of other abdominal organs and no evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
